title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 14-4.170 - Floors
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 14-4.170 - Floors

State Regulations
(a) Floors and floor coverings of mobile food service establishments are to be maintained clean and in good repair and are to be smooth, durable and nonabsorbent. The use of sawdust, wood shavings, peanut hulls or similar material as a floor covering in food preparation and storage areas is prohibited. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
§§
14-4.170

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
